summary: An Ordinance providing for the payment of the cost and expense, by the mode of payment by bonds, for the changing and establishing of the curb grades of Melrose Avenue, from Melrose Place to Howard Avenue, of East Olive Street, as platted, from Melrose Avenue to Bellevue Avenue, and of Olive Street as platted and as extended and established under Ordinance No. 23954, from Howard Avenue to Bellevue Avenue, all in the City of Seattle.
